PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-08372011-07-29,  ,  ,  NRCAN, 
ActAuditor General Act
Subject Canada-Newfoundland Offshore Petroleum Board (CNOPB) and the Canada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Board (CNSOPB)
PrecisOrder requesting that THE AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA audit the Canada-Newfoundland Offshore Petroleum Board and the Canada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Board, and report to the House of Commons with the results of those audits.
AttachmentsAttachment
